mobile.title: Self-Service Application for Mobile Operator
mobile.description: Delivered a flexible mobile self-service app with seamless UX, real-time features, and secure telecom integration.
mobile.clientDescription: A leading prepaid cellular service provider. Known for their flexibility and lifestyle-focused branding, the company delivers affordable and customizable mobile connectivity to a wide customer base.
mobile.challenge: In the competitive prepaid telecom market, user expectations for digital services are high, especially when it comes to speed, convenience, and personalization. The client needed a robust and flexible mobile self-service app that could support a variety of functions, from real-time balance checks and data package purchases to delivering targeted promotional offers. One of the core challenges was maintaining a seamless and visually dynamic user experience, especially during frequent promotional campaigns that required quick front-end updates and custom UI elements. At the same time, the app had to ensure smooth back-end integration with telecom systems, secure transactions, and consistent performance across devices and user bases. Balancing technical complexity with fast iteration and marketing agility was key.
mobile.solution: To meet the client's needs, we assembled a dedicated team focused on end-to-end mobile app development covering both front-end customization and back-end system integration. Our developers worked closely with the client's product and marketing teams to ensure that the app not only delivered core telecom functionality like balance tracking, data package ordering, and SIM management, but could also be quickly adapted to reflect seasonal campaigns and lifestyle-driven promotions. On the back end, the team ensured reliable and secure connections to the client's telecom infrastructure, supporting smooth user authentication, payment processing, and service activation workflows. On the front end, we implemented a modular UI framework that allowed for fast rollout of custom visuals and dynamic content enabling real-time updates without compromising performance.
mobile.outcome1: Seamless user experience across Android and iOS
mobile.outcome2: Ensured stable and secure integration with core telecom systems

medical.title: Medical Staff e-Learning Suite
medical.description: A fully integrated e-learning platform enabling modern medical training with hybrid labs and video-based assessment.
medical.clientDescription: A forward-thinking medical training centre that strives to digitalise and streamline medical training with next-generation solutions.
medical.challengeP1: The medical training center needed more than a standard e-learning system—it required a solution that could handle the complex logistics of daily academic operations while also supporting next-gen, instructor-free training models. Manual workflows made student enrollment, attendance tracking, and training room allocation time-consuming and error-prone.
medical.challengeP2: Additionally, traditional methods of training and assessment relied heavily on in-person supervision, limiting flexibility for both students and staff. The center envisioned a new kind of training experience where hybrid labs could enable students to perform hands-on tasks independently, with their performance captured and reviewed later via video-based evaluation. The challenge was to build an integrated platform that could meet these operational needs while embracing remote assessment, automation, and scalable learning formats tailored for medical education.
medical.solutionP1: To meet the center's evolving needs, we developed a fully integrated e-learning suite tailored specifically for medical training environments. The platform covers the complete learner journey—from online student enrollment and secure identity verification to attendance tracking, space allocation, and digital exam administration. Built with flexibility in mind, the system supports both in-person and remote learning formats.
medical.solutionP2: At the heart of the solution is its support for hybrid lab training—a forward-looking model that allows students to perform hands-on exercises independently, without the need for an instructor to be physically present. All student actions in the lab are video recorded and stored securely, enabling instructors to review performance at a later time and provide detailed feedback.
medical.solutionP3: Notifications and updates are delivered in real time to keep students and staff informed, while the admin panel provides training managers with complete oversight of space scheduling, session planning, and exam tracking. The platform simplifies training operations, supports remote skill assessments, and enables the adoption of innovative learning models in medical education.
medical.outcome2: Streamlined enrollment, attendance, exams, and scheduling in one unified platform
medical.outcome3: Enabled hybrid lab training model with video-based assessment
medical.outcome4: Improved training accessibility and flexibility for students
medical.outcome6: Simplified tracking of exam results and lab availability

website.title: User Module for Global High-Traffic Website
website.description: Built a scalable user management system handling millions of concurrent users with advanced security and personalization.
website.clientDescription: A global technology company operating a high-traffic web platform serving millions of users worldwide across multiple regions and time zones.
website.challenge: The client needed a robust user management module capable of handling millions of concurrent users while maintaining security, personalization, and performance. Legacy systems couldn't scale to meet growing demand, and user experience was suffering from slow load times and authentication issues.
website.solution: We architected and implemented a highly scalable user module with distributed authentication, advanced caching strategies, and personalized content delivery. The solution includes multi-factor authentication, session management across regions, real-time user analytics, and seamless integration with existing services.
website.outcome2: Achieved 99.99% uptime with global load balancing
website.outcome4: Enhanced security with zero breaches since deployment
